rules_text: {4}{W}, Exile Charging Brightmare from your graveyard: Bless target creature. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](Create a token copy of this creature’s blessing attached to that permanent.)[/i]
rules_text2:
[i](You may also cast this side from your hand.)[/i]
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.
Whenever enchanted creature dies, create a 2/2 white Pegasus creature token with flying.
